cnbc.title: Palantir tops estimates, boosts fourth-quarter guidance on AI adoption
cnbc.summary: Palantir's earnings topped third-quarter results and the company issued strong guidance, attributing much of its rapid growth to artificial intelligence.

cnbc.title: SNAP update: Trump admin will pay 50% of food stamp benefits in November amid shutdown
cnbc.summary: The agreement to use contingency funds to pay for food stamp benefits came after a judge said Trump administration could not cease paying for the benefits.

cnbc.title: Amazon closes at record after $38 billion OpenAI deal with AWS
cnbc.summary: OpenAI will immediately begin tapping Nvidia's AI processors using infrastructure from Amazon Web Services.

cnbc.title: Kimberly-Clark agrees to buy Tylenol owner Kenvue in $48.7 billion deal, creating consumer staples giant
cnbc.summary: The combined company would bring together brands like Huggies and Kleenex with the likes of Band-Aid and Tylenol.

cnbc.title: Starbucks to form joint venture with Boyu Capital to run China business
cnbc.summary: In recent years, the coffee giant has seen its sales in China plummet.

cnbc.title: Warren Buffett may have cut Berkshire's stake in Apple again in the third quarter
cnbc.summary: In its latest quarterly report, Berkshire said the cost basis of its consumer products equity holdings fell by roughly $1.2 billion from the prior quarter.

cnbc.title: Fed Governor Lisa Cook, in first policy speech since Trump suit, says she's undecided on Dec. rate cut
cnbc.summary: The central banker said Monday that she supported the recent interest rate reduction and indicated she would be open to more.

cnbc.title: States sue Trump admin over rule limiting student loan forgiveness for public servants
cnbc.summary: New York Attorney General Letitia James is suing the Trump administration over its new rule limiting eligibility for Public Service Loan Forgiveness.

cnbc.title: People without kids should make this money move before it's too late, estate planning expert says
cnbc.summary: Having certain estate planning documents in place is especially important for people without obvious next-of-kin, experts say.

cnbc.title: Ether falls 7% following a multimillion dollar hack of a decentralized finance protocol
cnbc.summary: The Ethereum-linked token briefly fell below its critical $3,600 level as investors wrung their hands over several bearish events.
